mapper.select: SELECT c.name FROM city c INNER JOIN province p ON c.province_id = p.id WHERE p.name = #{province}
SELECT a.name FROM area a INNER JOIN city c ON a.city_id = c.id WHERE c.name = #{city}
mapper.insert: INSERT IGNORE INTO addr_detail (name, area_id, kind) VALUE (#{name}, (SELECT id FROM area WHERE name = #{area}), #{kind})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM addr_detail WHERE name = #{name} AND area_id = (SELECT id FROM area WHERE name = #{area})
mapper.select: SELECT id FROM addr_detail WHERE name = #{name} AND area_id = (SELECT id FROM area WHERE name = #{area})

SELECT ad.name as detail, a.name as area, c.name as city, p.name as province FROM ((addr_detail ad INNER JOIN area a ON ad.area_id = a.id) INNER JOIN city c ON a.city_id = c.id) INNER JOIN province p ON c.province_id = p.id WHERE ad.id = #{addrDetailId}
